name: Cake Farm
description:
Welcome to the donut shop snack Cake Farm. The shop, cake farm served for customers who are hungry side with delicious donut, made from the powder preparation until crispy, arranged for attractive decoration. Stores also sell more ice cream, milk and coffee ... for parts for your snacks.
The salient features:
- Make lots of coins to finance your business.
- Serve jovial enthusiasm to customers return to buy more next time.
- Created the delicious and beautiful cakes more
- Making creams your own liking.
- Clean neat bakery using brooms and clean towels before closing.
- Baking machinery repair when damaged.
Download cake farm and to be the professional shopper.
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
